======Base pierce chance for vindicator.======

= Description =

Controls the likelihood of a vindicator pellet piercing an alien.

Requires <!--[asw_vindicator_piercing]-->[[asw_vindicator_piercing.wiki|asw_vindicator_piercing]] to be higher than 0.
